product_name: Tune Belt Sport Armband for Samsung Galaxy S3
long_description: The lightweight and comfortable Tune Belt Sport armband secures your Samsung Galaxy S3 or similarly sized smartphone on your arm during your workout. Designed to accommodate a Samsung Galaxy S3 in a protective case (not included). The Tune Belt Sport armband also securely stores and manages your headphone cord. Clear front lets you operate your phone's touch-screen while it's in the armband. Adjustable band fits arms measuring 9 - 17 in. in circumference.
short_description: The lightweight and comfortable Tune Belt Sport armband secures your Samsung Galaxy S3 or similarly sized smartphone on your arm during your workout.
